summary.span: 表示 Word 项目中的一个文档，这些项目通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

span.span: Represents a document in Word projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象提供相同的成员从 Word 主互操作程序集，但它的对象将添加以下功能：A object provides the same members as a object from the Word primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features: - 属性。 property. 使用此属性将托管的控件添加到 Word 文档，或删除控件，在运行时。Use this property to add managed controls to a Word document, or remove controls, at run time. - 属性。 property. 此属性用于向文档添加智能标记。Use this property to add smart tags to a document. - 属性。 property. 使用此属性来获取基础对象。Use this property to get the underlying object for a . - 文档级事件，如和，仅在 Word 对象模型中的应用程序级别提供。Document-level events, such as and , that are provided only at the application level in the Word object model. 也就是说，在 Word 对象模型中，这些事件都位于对象而不是对象。That is, in the Word object model, these events are available on the object rather than a object. 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建对象使用`GetVstoObject`方法。In an application-level project, you can create a object by using the `GetVstoObject` method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md). 在文档级项目中，通常不使用直接对象。In a document-level project, you typically do not use objects directly. 请改用`ThisDocument`类以编程方式访问你的项目中的文档。Instead, use the `ThisDocument` class to programmatically access the document in your project. `ThisDocument`类派生其大多数成员从类。The `ThisDocument` class derives most of its members from the class. 此类将对其成员的所有调用重都定向到的内部实现接口中[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。This class redirects all calls to its members to an internal implementation of the interface in the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文档没有活动的主题，此属性将返回"none"。This property returns "none" if the document does not have an active theme. 返回此属性的值的说明，请参阅`Name`参数方法。For an explanation of the value returned by this property, see the `Name` argument of the method. 返回此属性的值可能与主题的显示名称不对应。The value returned by this property might not correspond to the theme's display name. 若要返回主题的显示名称，使用属性。To return a theme's display name, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文档没有活动的主题，此属性将返回"none"。This property returns "none" if the document does not have an active theme. 主题的显示名称是出现在名称**主题**对话框。A theme's display name is the name that appears in the **Theme** dialog box. 此名称可能不对应于你用来设置默认主题，或将主题应用于文档的字符串。This name might not correspond to the string you would use to set a default theme or to apply a theme to a document.

summary.span: 将主题应用到此文档（如果文档已打开）。

span.span: Applies a theme to a document, if the document is open.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式`Name`字符串是"主题 nnn"其中主题和 nnn 定义的如下所示：The format of the `Name` string is "theme nnn" where theme and nnn are defined as follows: 主题 – 包含请求的主题的数据的文件夹的名称。theme – The name of the folder that contains the data for the requested theme. （主题数据文件夹的默认位置是 C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes11。）你必须使用为该主题的文件夹名称而不是显示中的显示名称**主题**对话框。(The default location for theme data folders is C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes11.) You must use the folder name for the theme rather than the display name that appears in the **Theme** dialog box. nnn – 指示格式设置选项以激活 (若要激活，0，若要停用的 1) 的主题的三个数字字符串。nnn – A three-digit string that indicates which theme formatting options to activate (1 to activate, 0 to deactivate). 每个数字对应于**鲜艳****颜色**， **Active** **图形**，和**后台** **映像**中的复选框**主题**对话框。The digits correspond to the **Vivid** **Colors**, **Active** **Graphics**, and **Background** **Image** check boxes in the **Theme** dialog box. 如果省略此字符串，nnn 的默认值是"011"（活动图形和背景图像都被激活）。If this string is omitted, the default value for nnn is "011" (Active Graphics and Background Image are activated).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Type`|之一指定要检查的兼容性选项的值。One of the values that specifies the compatibility option to check for.| 如果你使用未指定参数的属性，它返回不应在代码中直接使用的对象。If you use the property without specifying a parameter, it returns a object that is not intended to be used directly from your code. 兼容性选项会影响 Microsoft Office Word 文档的显示方式。Compatibility options affect how a document is displayed in Microsoft Office Word. 某些值可能不是提供给你，具体取决于的语言支持 （美国美式英语）。Some of the values might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中，如果段落位于之后硬分页符会取消段前的空间。The following code example suppresses the space before a paragraph if the paragraph is located after a hard page break. 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。This example is for an application-level add-in. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordDocument_AppLevelAddIn#70](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument_AppLevelAddIn/CS/ThisAddIn.cs#70)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordDocument_AppLevelAddIn#70](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordDocument_AppLevelAddIn/VB/ThisAddIn.vb#70)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打开在早期版本的 Word 中创建的文档时，兼容性模式将打开。When you open a document that was created in a previous version of Word, Compatibility Mode is turned on. 兼容性模式可确保在处理文档时，[!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中没有新增或增强功能可用，以便使用早期版本的 Word 编辑文档的用户获得完全编辑功能。Compatibility Mode ensures that no new or enhanced features in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] are available while working with a document, so that people who edit the document using previous versions of Word will have full editing capabilities. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种类型的数字： 预设数字 ()，这可以通过选择中的模板添加到段落**项目符号和编号**对话框; 和 LISTNUM 字段 ()，使您能够添加多个每个段落的一个数字。There are two types of numbers: preset numbers (), which you can add to paragraphs by selecting a template in the **Bullets and Numbering** dialog box; and LISTNUM fields (), which enable you to add more than one number per paragraph. 方法很有用，如果你想要使用另一个应用程序中的文档和列表格式或 LISTNUM 字段，该应用程序无法识别。The method is useful if you want to work with a document in another application and that application does not recognize list formatting or LISTNUM fields. 将列表数字转换为文本后，你无法再在列表中处理它们。After you convert list numbers to text, you can no longer manipulate them in a list. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

Word 表中存储的随机数，并在每次保存后更新表。Word stores the random numbers in a table and updates the table after each save. 属性返回的最后一个号分配给该文档该单词。The property returns the last number that Word assigned to the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结果方法存储在基于字符的字符的属性。The results of the method are stored in the property on a character by character basis. 方法检查文档 （标头、 页脚、 文本框中，和等） 中的所有可用的文本。The method checks all available text in the document (headers, footers, text boxes, and so forth). 如果方法已应用到指定的文本，属性设置为`true`。If the method has already been applied to the specified text, the property is set to `true`. 若要重新评估指定的文本的语言，必须首先设置属性`false`。To re-evaluate the language of the specified text, you must first set the property to `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁用在 属性中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性只影响为其设置属性的文档。This property only affects the document for which you set the property. 如果你打算共享与早期版本的 Microsoft Office Word 中，因此不引入其版本的 Word 中均不提供的功能的用户之间的文档，请使用此属性。Use this property if you plan on sharing a document between users with earlier versions of Microsoft Office Word, so you do not introduce features that are not available in their versions of Word. 使用属性禁用在所有文档后，将指定的版本推出的功能。Use the property to disable in all documents features introduced after a specified version.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在指定版本的 Microsoft Office Word 之后引入的所有功能是否仅在该文档中禁用。

value.span: 值之一。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为`true`之前设置属性。The property must be set to `true` prior to setting the property. 否则为设置才会生效，并且将保持为其的 Word 97 适用于 Windows 的默认设置。Otherwise, the setting will not take effect and will remain at its default setting of Word 97 for Windows. 属性只影响该属性设置的文档。The property only affects the document for which the property is set. 如果你想要设置要禁用的所有文档的功能，请使用的应用程序的全局选项属性。If you want to set a global option for the application to disable features for all documents, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`false`如果用户位于东亚语言系统，并且想要创建的其他用户不具有针对其系统上的该语言的字体可读的文档非常有用。Setting this property to `false` is useful if the user is on an East Asian system and wants to create a document that is readable by others who do not have fonts for that language on their system. 例如，日语系统上的用户可以选择要在文档中嵌入字体，以便日语文档可在所有系统上可读。For example, a user on a Japanese system could choose to embed the fonts in a document so that the Japanese document would be readable on all systems.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在公式跨越两行或更多行时 Microsoft Office Word 放置二元运算符的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies where Microsoft Office Word places binary operators when equations span two or more lines.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式时将在一个二元运算符处中断 — 例如，加法、 减法或乘法运算符 — 有三个不同的运算符的放置方式： 换行符之前、 之后、 在换行，并且重复之前和之后中断。When the equation breaks on a binary operator—for example, an addition, subtraction, or multiplication operator—there are three different placements of the operator: before the break, after the break, and repeated both before and after the break. 当此属性设置为，使用属性来指定如何 Word 将出现在行中断之前的减法运算符。When this property is set to , use the property to specify how Word treats subtraction operators that appear before a line break.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 Microsoft Office Word 如何处理位于换行符之前的减法运算符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how Microsoft Office Word handles a subtraction operator that falls before a line break.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性仅当属性设置为。This property is used only when the property is set to . 换行符落在减法运算符上和文档设置为重复减法运算符上的以下行，因为两个减号得正时，有时减法接收特殊处理。Subtraction sometimes receives special treatment when a line break falls on a subtraction operator and the document setting is to repeat the subtraction operator on the following line, because two negatives make a positive. 某些编写器选择一个减号转换加号，而某些选择保留两个减号。Some writers choose to convert one of the minus signs into a plus sign, and some choose to keep the two negatives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果保护文档，则用户可以进行有限的更改，如添加批注、 进行修订，或者完成窗体。When a document is protected, users can make only limited changes, such as adding annotations, making revisions, or completing a form. 如果已受保护文档，在使用此方法时，将引发异常。If the document is already protected when you use this method, an exception is thrown. 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications. 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以通过执行以下任务来删除自定义项：This method removes the customization by performing the following tasks: - 它将删除`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`从文档的自定义属性。It deletes the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom properties from the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。For more information, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md). - 它从文档中删除缓存的数据。It deletes the cached data from the document. 有关缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。For more information about cached data, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md). 此方法可能引发如果受保护文档。This method might throw an if the document is protected. 应调用此方法之前从文档中删除任何保护。You should remove any protection from the document before calling this method.

exception.span: 无法从文档移除自定义文档属性或缓存数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法需要用户的计算机上启用了传真服务。Using this method requires that a fax service is enabled on a user's computer. 如果传真服务未启用，方法引发异常。If a fax service is not enabled, the method throws an exception. 用于指定中的传真号码的格式`Recipients`参数可以是* recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider *或* recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber *。The format used for specifying fax numbers in the `Recipients` parameter is either *recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider* or *recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber*. 您可以访问用户的传真提供程序信息使用以下注册表路径：You can access the user's fax provider information using the following registry path: `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\11.0\Common\Services\Fax` 使用`FaxAddress`键值在此注册表位置来确定要使用用户的格式。Use the `FaxAddress` key value at this registry location to determine the format to use for a user. 如果此注册表项不存在，则传真服务不可用。If this registry entry does not exist, no fax service is available. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中打开使用早期版本的 Word 创建的文档时，兼容性模式将打开。When you open a document in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] that was created in a previous version of Word, Compatibility Mode is turned on. 兼容性模式可确保在处理文档时，[!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中没有新增或增强功能可用，以便使用早期版本的 Word 编辑文档的用户获得完全编辑功能。Compatibility Mode ensures that no new or enhanced features in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] are available while working with a document, so that people who edit the document using previous versions of Word will have full editing capabilities. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示错误消息文本是从内置的 Microsoft Office Word 错误消息生成，还是从包含在 Office 中的 Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 组件生成。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether error message text is generated from the built-in Microsoft Office Word error messages or from the Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 component included with Office.

value.span: 如果错误信息文本是从 MSXML 5.0 组件生成的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if error message text is generated from the MSXML 5.0 component; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用从 MSXML 5.0 组件的高级的错误消息提供更具体的错误消息。Using advanced error messages from the MSXML 5.0 component provides more specific error messages. 有大约 500 错误消息都可以访问 XML Core Services 通过提供属性是`true`。There are approximately 500 error messages provided through the XML Core Services that are accessible when the property is `true`. Word 有大约 50 个内置的常规架构错误。Word has approximately 50 built-in generic schema errors. 当属性是`false`，Word 将内置的错误消息用于在 XML 文档中生成的错误。When the property is `false`, Word uses the built-in error messages for errors generated in XML documents.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否通过可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 来保存文档。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to save a document through an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT).

value.span: 如果文档是通过 XSLT 保存的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the document is saved through an XSLT; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置时属性`true`，使用属性来指定要使用的 XSLT 路径和文件名。When setting the property to `true`, use the property to specify the path and file name of the XSLT to use.
